title: http: panic serving 127.0.0.1:41692: leveldb: not found

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
This error appears in the console:

```
2014/08/05 16:59:53 http: panic serving 127.0.0.1:41692: leveldb: not found
```

As you can also see below, there are frequent ping timeouts with the other nodes (which is causing frequent rescans and CPU usage), but I don't know whether that is related to this error.
This node is running 0.9.0 on Ubuntu 12.04.

Full console output:

